title: Urbanization in the United Arab Emirates 2018
yAxis: Share of urban population in total population
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of urban population in total population. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Share of urban population in total population has increased over the Year.
Share of urban population in total population is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Share of urban population in total population, of value 86.52 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Share of urban population in total population, of value 83.38 was reported at Year 2008
